metadata.title: CVE-2015-0845 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Format string vulnerability in Movable Type Pro, Open Source, and Advancedbefore 5.2.13 and Pro and Advanced 6.0.x before 6.0.8 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via vectors related to localization oftemplates.

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
